Uses of Class
com.vmware.vcenter.namespace_management.VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder

  • Packages that use VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder 
    Package Description
    com.vmware.vcenter.namespace_management
    The com.vmware.vcenter.namespace_management package provides interfaces for managing Namespaces.

    • Uses of VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder in com.vmware.vcenter.namespace_management

      Methods in com.vmware.vcenter.namespace_management that return VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder.setConfigSpec(com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Structure configSpec)
      A VirtualMachineConfigSpec associated with the VM class.
      VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder.setCpuReservation(java.lang.Long cpuReservation)
      Deprecated. 
      As of release vSphere API 8.0.2.0. Use CPU allocation in VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.getConfigSpec() instead to reserve CPUs for a virtual machine. If null, no CPU reservation is requested for the virtual machine.
      VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder.setDescription(java.lang.String description)
      Description for the VM class.
      VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder.setDevices(VirtualMachineClassesTypes.VirtualDevices devices)
      Deprecated. 
      As of release vSphere API 8.0.2.0. Use device changes in VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.getConfigSpec() instead to add vGPU and Dynamic DirectPath I/O virtual devices. If null, no Virtual device will be attached to the VMs created with this class.
      VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder.setInstanceStorage(VirtualMachineClassesTypes.InstanceStorage instanceStorage)
      Instance storage that will be attached to the VMs created with this class.
      VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder.setMemoryReservation(java.lang.Long memoryReservation)
      Deprecated. 
      As of release vSphere API 8.0.2.0. Use memory allocation in VirtualMachineClassesTypes.CreateSpec.getConfigSpec() instead to reserve memory for a virtual machine. If null, no memory reservation is requested for virtual machine.
